long_description: If you're an all-mountain rider who enjoys a softer boot, choose the Nike Zoom Kaiju snowboard boots. They feature Nike Free-inspired outsoles for a more connected feel to your board. Lace locking hardware personalizes the fit by allowing the upper and lower zones to tighten independently of each other. High-end synthetic waterproof leather uppers keep feet dry; full-length internal backstays give boots a soft flex for great control in turns. Custom moldable polyethylene and EVA foam liners feature an easy-to-use, secure lace-lock power strap and stretchy neoprene toe boxes for extra comfort. Internal lacing harnesses keep your heels locked down; neoprene flex zones at ankles encourage forward flex so you can rip big turns and control your edges. Warming Blanket Strobel is a heat-reflective material in both the shell and the liner that helps retain heat and keep the cold out. Nike Free-inspired midsoles/outsoles feature embedded Zoom Air cushioning for superior comfort when on your board and when walking around.
